/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with white clouds, adding to the overall vibrancy of the scene. The colors in the image are rich and varied, reflecting the lively atmosphere of the city.
